rest-prefix-mismatch:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown if $wgRestPath is incorrect or otherwise not matched. Parameters:
* $1: The requested path.
* $2: The configured root path ($wgRestPath).
rest-wrong-method:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the HTTP method is incorrect. Parameters:
* $1: The received request method.
* $2: A comma-separated list of allowed methods for this path.
* $3: The number of items in the list $2
rest-no-match:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the path has the correct prefix but did not match any registered handler. Parameters:
* $1: The received request path, relative to $wgRestPath.
rest-pagehistory-incompatible-params: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if incompatible parameters are specified.
rest-pagehistory-param-range-error: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if a revision id is provided but is out of range.
rest-pagehistory-title-nonexistent: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the specified title does not exist.
rest-pagehistory-revision-nonexistent: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the specified revision does not exist.
rest-pagehistory-timestamp-error: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if an error occurred loading the timestamp for the specified revision.
rest-pagehistorycount-title-nonexistent: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the specified title does not exist.
rest-pagehistory-title-permission-denied:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the user doesn't have read access to the specified title. Parameters:
* $1 The page title
rest-pagehistorycount-type-unrecognized: Error message for REST API debugging, shown if the specified type is not valid.
rest-revision-nonexistent:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown when the revision does not exist. Parameters:
* $1: the specified revision.
rest-revision-permission-denied:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown when the user doesn't have access to the specified revision. Parameters:
* $1: the specified revision.
rest-compare-page-mismatch: Error message for REST API debugging, shown when the revisions belong to different pages.
rest-compare-permission-denied: Error message for REST API debugging, shown when the user doesn't have access to the specified revisions.
rest-compare-nonexistent:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown when one of the revisions does not exist. Parameters:
* $1: The parameter name, either "from" or "to".
rest-compare-inaccessible:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown when the text of one of the revisions has been deleted or suppressed so that only privileged users can view it. Parameters:
* $1: The parameter name, either "from" or "to".
rest-compare-wrong-content:
Error message for REST API debugging, shown when Content::convert() fails to convert the revision to text. Parameters:
* $1: The slot role name, usually "main".
* $2: The parameter name, either "from" or "to".
rest-compare-wikidiff2: Error message for REST API debugging.
